main event: A red disc-like object was observed at Richards Gebauer AFB, Missouri on April 17, 1960.
interesting points: The object was seen through binoculars and a telescope,The object moved from North of Orion to the South,The weather was fair with clear skies,The angular size was about 2 minutes of arc,There was speculation that it could have been a vehicle of the Discoverer class on reentry.
witness description: Jim C. Ford and a field representative of the K. C. Moon Watch
